, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the Reset icon.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.

Blur personalizations are disabled during keyguard view. Only translucent notifications are enabled.

These colors are the ones tiniting the BlurBackground. Instead of the normal Grey, you can now choose the colors in the way you like.
There are three color filters: One used for light backgrounds, one used for Dark backgrounds and one used for light/dark backgrounds.
So how these colors work?
Simple, as the titles say, the Light filter will be used for Lighter backgrounds, Dark filter for dark backgrounds and the mixed filter one will be used for backgrounds not too dark but neither too light.
These colors are used for both BlurBackgrounds: StatusBar and RecentsApps window
Blur personalizations are disabled during keyguard view. Only translucent notifications are enabled.

To clear all apps, pinch-in with two fingers on the panel. To block an app from being cleared, long press on its icon to star it.\n\nFor additional recents features such as multiwindow or to kill an app, long press or drag an app card in the panel.

Notifications sound and vibration if screen is on

Ambient Music Ticker shows playing music track info within Ambient display screen.

It's triggered also if Ambient Display is disabled when a new track is started, forcing a clean ambient screen with track info in the middle of the screen.

You can also double tap on track info to skip track.

To dismiss your notifications, swipe left or right on the fingerprint sensor on the back of your phone.

Use gestures on bottom of the screen to control navigation

Back
- Swipe up on left or right side

Home
- Swipe up center

Recent apps
- Swipe up center and hold

Long press home
- Short swipe up and hold in the center

Works best with navigation bar disabled
